title: High Court Hears Challenge To 4 States' Gay-Marriage Ban
teaser: On Tuesday, the justices of the U.S. Supreme Court sparred, skewered and probed the legal arguments on gay marriage. But at the end of a tumultuous day, there still was no certainty about the outcome.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
